title: How Farrow & Ball De Nimes Transformed Our Cozy Cottage Living Room
description: Our Freshly Painted Living Room Makeover I’m so excited to share a recent transformation in our cozy cottage—the front living room has been given a fresh new look with a beautiful shade of blue. We chose Farrow & Ball’s De Nimes, but to achieve a lighter, more personalized touch, we had it mixed at 50% […]
author: Jose Galvan
excerpt: Looking for a cozy snug color for your next space? Check out Farrow & Ball De Nimes. Did you know you can customize it?
text: Our Freshly Painted Living Room MakeoverI’m so excited to share a recent transformation in our cozy cottage—the front living room has been given a fresh new look with a beautiful shade of blue. We chose Farrow & Ball’s De Nimes, but to achieve a lighter, more personalized touch, we had it mixed at 50% lighter. About Farrow & Ball’s De NimesDe Nimes is described by Farrow & Ball as a “quietly elegant blue” that’s both grounding and versatile. Its name is inspired by the French city of Nîmes, known for producing the fabric that led to the term “denim,” reflecting the color’s timeless and down-to-earth nature.In our space, this softened blue-gray hue brings a serene and inviting atmosphere, perfectly complementing our cottage’s aesthetic. The lighter version of De Nimes offers a subtle pop of color while maintaining a neutral backdrop that harmonizes with various decor elements.Styling Tips for a Cozy Cottage FeelTo bring in that signature cozy feeling we love so much around here, we layered the room with warm, natural textures—dreamy linen curtains, rustic wooden pieces, and soft, cream-colored furniture. This cozy combination makes the living room the perfect spot to curl up, unwind, and spend sweet moments together.Customize Your Paint Colors with Percentage AdjustmentsIf you’re considering a paint refresh, experimenting with color percentages can beautifully customize any hue to match your style and space. We typically find ourselves going about 50% lighter or darker, which is a sweet spot for balancing color depth, but remember—you can absolutely alter the intensity by any percentage to get your perfect shade. Whether it’s just a subtle tweak or a dramatic shift, playing with paint percentages makes creating your dream space even more personal.I hope you found this blog post helpful and inspiring. We look forward to helping you find your own version of cozy throughout tips and tricks to get the perfect custom look to fit your style! You can click HERE to any linkable products from this post! Thank you so much for stopping by the blog today and every other day. Keep up with us daily here.xxLizMarie
html:
Our Freshly Painted Living Room Makeover

I’m so excited to share a recent transformation in our cozy cottage—the front living room has been given a fresh new look with a beautiful shade of blue. We chose Farrow & Ball’s De Nimes, but to achieve a lighter, more personalized touch, we had it mixed at 50% lighter.

About Farrow & Ball’s De Nimes

De Nimes is described by Farrow & Ball as a “quietly elegant blue” that’s both grounding and versatile. Its name is inspired by the French city of Nîmes, known for producing the fabric that led to the term “denim,” reflecting the color’s timeless and down-to-earth nature.

In our space, this softened blue-gray hue brings a serene and inviting atmosphere, perfectly complementing our cottage’s aesthetic. The lighter version of De Nimes offers a subtle pop of color while maintaining a neutral backdrop that harmonizes with various decor elements.

Styling Tips for a Cozy Cottage Feel

To bring in that signature cozy feeling we love so much around here, we layered the room with warm, natural textures—dreamy linen curtains, rustic wooden pieces, and soft, cream-colored furniture. This cozy combination makes the living room the perfect spot to curl up, unwind, and spend sweet moments together.

Customize Your Paint Colors with Percentage Adjustments

If you’re considering a paint refresh, experimenting with color percentages can beautifully customize any hue to match your style and space. We typically find ourselves going about 50% lighter or darker, which is a sweet spot for balancing color depth, but remember—you can absolutely alter the intensity by any percentage to get your perfect shade. Whether it’s just a subtle tweak or a dramatic shift, playing with paint percentages makes creating your dream space even more personal.

I hope you found this blog post helpful and inspiring. We look forward to helping you find your own version of cozy throughout tips and tricks to get the perfect custom look to fit your style! You can click HERE to any linkable products from this post! Thank you so much for stopping by the blog today and every other day. Keep up with us daily here.

xxLizMarie
